item.title: :// Welcome
item.description: hljs.initHighlightingOnLoad(); Hey It’s only fair that I introduce myself. I’m Adam, from Melbourne in Australia! You’ll find me working on a few tech related things, or building solutions for local businesses. As of July 2020 I’m working on Topre.design with Daniel Augoustakis to provide brand solutions at a full service capacity. There are numerous smaller projects that i’m tackling during this COVID period also that I may post about. The main areas which i’ll be posting are:
